content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Chinese

# Target Word
harbor

# Text Fragment
The sailors steered toward the calm harbor at dusk

# Paragraph Context
The storm had finally passed. <fragment>The sailors steered toward the calm <target>harbor</target> at dusk.</fragment> Lanterns flickered along the pier.
{"word_translation":"港湾","fragment_translation":"水手们在黄昏时把船驶向平静的港湾"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Chinese

# Target Word
relay

# Dictionary Definition
Verb: to pass on information or a message to another person or group

# Text Fragment
She will relay the message to the team tomorrow

# Paragraph Context
The briefing ended quickly. <fragment>She will <target>relay</target> the message to the team tomorrow.</fragment> Everyone began packing up their laptops.
{"word_translation":"传达","fragment_translation":"她明天会把这个消息传达给团队"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Chinese

# Target Word
glimpse

# Text Fragment
He caught a brief glimpse of the comet before the clouds closed in

# Paragraph Context
The crowd waited in silence. <fragment>He caught a brief <target>glimpse</target> of the comet before the clouds closed in.</fragment> Moments later the sky was completely gray.
{"word_translation":"一瞥","fragment_translation":"在云层合拢前，他匆匆瞥见了那颗彗星"}
